name: BirthdayBash
description:
Eat the birthday babys cake!

How to play:

You move around with wasd or arrowkeys, dodge the babys fists or lose hp!

You can quickly dash, using stamina, with spacebar.

Wait for the fork to charge up, when it is fully charged, press w or

the up-arrowkey to pick it up.

If you now press space, you will have to time your throw to deal massive damage!

-Press space again to throw.

Beat the baby!
